5C03FB1A406D2952EF48AB903FD1BBD7: Find me in the land of The Ninja.
CCB763E548F944802C8C0EACE386278F: Icy rollers whose freezing shells are highly prized by the Ninja. Fearing the heat of the sun, these creatures are usually only found at night.
FDE45D3A45D1D0BCD7ADF1B9D17F5F53: Seek the land where Ninja spin to find the elements locked within.
